channel.title: No-IP | the sticky poll wasnt helpful
channel.description:
How do i get a no-IP host? i really really want one if so can ya tell me if possible how to get one
thanks
~~dha12oks

item.title: No-IP | the sticky poll wasnt helpful
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

no, its not noobie,anyway you enter cmd in the run>startmenu
then you enter your defualt gateway into your adress bar,and then enter your user and pass and go to advanced and fill it out,and you have a working server using no-ip!! I Hope This Helped
~I Blkwolf I~

Read full topic

item.title: No-IP | the sticky poll wasnt helpful
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

hmmmm… you need to port forward and go to www.no-ip.com and register,then make a host to your ip you got using cmd and then etc you cna figure it out easy from there. i hope this helped
~I Blkwolf I~
